title: Melanie Martinez
summary: Melanie Adele Martinez (born April 28, 1995) is an American singer, songwriter, actress, director, photographer, screenwriter, and visual artist. Born in Astoria, Queens, and raised in Baldwin, New York, Martinez rose to prominence in 2012 after appearing on the American television vocal talent show The Voice. Following the show, she[lower-alpha 1] released her debut single "Dollhouse", followed by her debut EP of the same name (2014), through Atlantic Records.
